title: "Emissions_score"
output: html_document

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
emissions_mod <- emissions %>% 
  group_by(CountryName) %>% 
  summarise(mean_CO2 = mean(EN.ATM.CO2E.PC)) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  mutate(finalrank_CO2 = rank(mean_CO2))

write.csv(emissions_mod, "Emissions_score.csv")

                                       
```
